entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
